answers.author: Paul Wolf
answers.text:
Pamela our software PublicStuff which is the glue between citizens and city workers responding to their needs and questions does allow management to create reports to evaluate each staff members body of work.  It is used by our city clients during reviews as well as over city evaluations of efficiency.
